actions.name: Illuminate
actions.description: Effect: The user ignores negative ACC [Stage Change] effects. The user ignores a target's positive EVA Stage when attacking. The user gains [Glow 2] or [Glow X+2].

system.description: Effect: The user ignores negative ACC [Stage Change] effects. The user ignores a target's positive EVA Stage when attacking. The user gains [Glow 2] or [Glow X+2].
